title: Boku, Ecchi na Tenshi desu!
original_name: ぼく、えっちな天使ですっ!
sinopse:
One night after returning home from his part-time job, Nagaru is met with the surprising request "Please have sex with me!" by a white winged, self-proclaimed angel boy named Alto. With this seemingly unreal situation and farfetched request, what kind of trouble has Nagaru gotten pulled into?

(Source: Takeshobo, translated)
